title: Peril
description: Gerard Mayes is in a bind. He's committed most of the seven deadly sins and is trying to avoid paying the price.I balance on the precipice of life.Friends and family have turned their backs on me and walked into the shadowland.Police and thieves are shouting Jump, Ger. Do it.Ladies, don't let your man read this book. You don't want him getting ideas on how to misbehave.Fellas, keep your copy well hidden.
author: Ruby Barnes
